body: This attractive silver headband is decorated with a number of small red and orange gemstones. The headband grants the wearer an enhancement bonus to Charisma of +2, +4, or +6. Treat this as a temporary ability bonus for the first 24 hours the headband is worn.
name: Headband of Alluring Charisma
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Headbands/Headband Slot Wondrous Items/Headband of Alluring Charisma
